trans-unit.source: Represents the addition of a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> to a workflow during dynamic update.
This class can be used by a tracking service to determine which <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>s have been added during a dynamic update.
An instance of this object is generated for every <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> that is added (that is, that did not exist in the workflow before this dynamic update).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.AddedConditionAction"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.AddedConditionAction"></xref> class using the definition of the added condition.
The condition added to the workflow.
addedConditionDefinition is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> to add to the workflow.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> to add to the workflow.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.AddedConditionAction.ConditionDefinition"></xref> is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Gets a string that contains the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> that was added to the workflow.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> that was added to the workflow.
